name: Raven Bow
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

storytitle: Bane of Flame and Water: Raven Bow
storytext: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. As such, hunters would decorate their bows' limbs with feathers which forebode the imminent death of their targets.
